Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Surf
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted, Clark and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Surf.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted, Clark and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Surf.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago, #67 67th-69th-71st & #N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute near Rhodes/68th
ShortDescription: #30, #67 & #N5 buses temp. rerouted EB: 69th, State and 67th; WB: 67th, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago, #67 67th-69th-71st & #N5 South Shore Night Bus buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, State and 67th.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #134 Stockton/LaSalle Express, #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express & #136 Sheridan/LaSalle Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Columbus
ShortDescription: #134 , #135 & #136 buses are rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Drive, Michigan and Wacker: due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Columbus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#134 Stockton/LaSalle Express, #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express and #136 Sheridan/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Drive, Michigan and Wacker: due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Columbus.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Halsted
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses rrtd WB via Pershing, Emerald, 42nd, Halsted & Pershing; EB via Pershing, Halsted. 42nd, Union & Pershing due to blockage nr Pershing/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a street blockage near Pershing/Halsted.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Pershing, Emerald, 42nd, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Pershing.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Pershing, Halsted. 42nd, Union, then resume their normal route on Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.
